DIRECT ENTRY  
PHC - No Direct Entry.  
CALABAR requires three (3) yearspost NCE 
qualification experience plus the 'O' level 
creditpassesin English Language and Mathematics 
ABSU - for three(3) -year programme, offers it as 
Educational Management.  
 UNIZIK requires 'O’ level / TC II credit/merit p ass in 
Mathematics/Arithmetic. In addition,EKSU accepts a 
pass at NCE General English language in Lieu of 'O' 
level credit pass in English Language.  
EKSU requires 'O' level credit passes in Mathematics 
and Economics. In addition, EKSU accepts NCE 
credit/merit in relevant subjects. LAGOS accepts  
NCE credit/merit in Arts or Social Sciences.  
very good passes in any three (3) JUPEB subject  
Economics, Literature in English, Christian Religious 
Studies/Islamic Studies, Government, History, 
Geography, Igbo/Yoruba and French.  
two (2)'A’ level passes from English Language, History, 
French, Geography, Mathematics, Igbo/Yoruba, 
Christian Religious  Studies /IRS, Economics and 
Government.  
  
LAGOS requires 'O' levelcreditpassesin English 
Language, Mathematics and any three (3) of Literature 
in English, History/Government, 
Economics/Commerce, Geography, any Nigerian  
Language, Christian Religious Stud ies/Islamic Studies. 
UNIZIK and ESUTECH do not insist on credit in 
Mathematics and Economics.  
EKSU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes at one (1) 
sitting.  
ABUJA and CALABAR do not insist on credit pass in 
Economics.
